code: import React from'react';import{withStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import Button from'@material-ui/core/Button';import api from'../api/api';import swal from'sweetalert';import CheckIcon from'@material-ui/icons/Check';var AcceptButtonDesign=withStyles(function(theme){return{root:{borderRadius:44,backgroundColor:'#2B64D2','&:hover':{backgroundColor:'#003ba0'},marginLeft:10,color:'white'}};})(Button);var AcceptButton=function AcceptButton(props){var userId={};userId.id=props.id;var handleOnAccept=function handleOnAccept(){api.accepUnassignedJobs(userId).then(function(res){swal({title:"Accepted!",text:"Job request has been successfully Accepted!",icon:"success",button:"OK"});props.onAction();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(AcceptButtonDesign,{style:{height:'30px',width:'100px'},onClick:function onClick(){return swal({title:"Are you sure to Accept the task?",text:"This action can not be undone!",icon:"warning",buttons:true,dangerMode:false}).then(function(willDelete){if(willDelete){handleOnAccept();}else{swal.close();}});}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CheckIcon,{style:{height:20,width:20}})," Accept");};export default AcceptButton;
